Home » 35Y10 Indriyayamakapāḷi » 1 Paṇṇattivāra
1.1 Paṇṇattivārauddesa
Paṇṇattivāra
Paṇṇattivārauddesa
1.
2Bāvīsatindriyāni—  cakkhundriyaṃ, sotindriyaṃ, ghānindriyaṃ, jivhindriyaṃ, kāyindriyaṃ, manindriyaṃ, itthindriyaṃ, purisindriyaṃ, jīvitindriyaṃ, sukhindriyaṃ, dukkhindriyaṃ, somanassindriyaṃ, domanassindriyaṃ, upekkhindriyaṃ, saddhindriyaṃ, vīriyindriyaṃ, satindriyaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ, paññindriyaṃ, anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ, aññindriyaṃ, aññātāvindriyaṃ.
  • 1.1.1 Padasodhanavāra
  • 1.1.2 Padasodhanamūlacakkavāra
  • 1.1.3 Suddhindriyavāra
  • 1.1.4 Suddhindriyamūlacakkavāra
